servinfo.title: Engine Construction Description
servinfo.ptxt: The engine is a water-cooled, 60° V6 cylinders, 4-stroke-cycle gasoline unit with its DOHC (Double overhead camshaft) valve mechanism arranged for “V” type valve configuration. The double overhead camshafts are mounted over the cylinder head. They are driven from crankshaft through timing chains, and no push rod is provided in the valve train system.
